content.question: In paragraph 1, sentence 6 (“During the week . . . with sandwiches”), the author’s description of her mother’s cooking serves primarily to

choices.label: explain the origins of a surprising ability
commemorate the admirable qualities of a remarkable person
set up a comparison that the author develops later in the passage
justify a choice that others might question

content.answer: set up a comparison that the author develops later in the passage

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Recognize and explain the use of methods of development to accomplish a purpose.
